mapper.sql: id, did, dcompany, address, phone, contact, eid, date, opstatus, status,total
mapper.select: select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename from apply_for_send t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename from apply_for_send t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where t.eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and de.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}

select count(*) from apply_for_send t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where t.eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and de.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0

limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from apply_for_send where eid=#{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename from apply_for_send t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where em.fullname like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from apply_for_send t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where em.fullname like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename from apply_for_send t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where t.status=0 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from apply_for_send where status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename from apply_for_send t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where em.fullname like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0 and t.opstatus=0 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}

select count(*) from apply_for_send t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where em.fullname like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0 and t.opstatus=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename from apply_for_send t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where t.status=0 and t.opstatus=0 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from apply_for_send where status=0 and opstatus=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename from apply_for_send t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where em.fullname like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0 and t.opstatus!=0 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}

select count(*) from apply_for_send t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where em.fullname like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0 and t.opstatus!=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename from apply_for_send t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where t.status=0 and t.opstatus!=0 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from apply_for_send where status=0 and opstatus!=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename from apply_for_send t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where t.eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.date >= #{start,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.date < #{end,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.opstatus = 1 and t.status=0 order by date desc

mapper.update:
update apply_for_send
did = #{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dcompany = #{dcompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eid = #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
opstatus = #{opstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total = #{total,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update apply_for_send set did = #{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dcompany = #{dcompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eid = #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, opstatus = #{opstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total = #{total,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
